    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TimeRecorder()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long calculateTimeRemaining()
      Returns the time remaining to the round
      boolean isTimeRemaining()
      Evaluates the time remaining of the round to see if the robot needs to return to the starting corner or not

      Records the time at the beginning of the competition

      • isTimeRemaining

        public boolean isTimeRemaining()
        Evaluates the time remaining of the round to see if the robot needs to return to the starting corner or not
        Returns:
        true if there is time remaining before returning to the starting corner, false otherwise
